result.relevanceClues: The episode revolves around medical attention and the need for medical help. Therefore, the Medical Health tier is completely relevant to this episode.

This highlights the importance of strong relationships and how family/friends can rely on each other in times of need. Therefore, the Family and Relationships tier is relevant to this episode.
The episode features Thirteen, a single woman, who turns to her colleague for help when her friend needs medical attention. Therefore, the Single Life tier is relevant to this episode.
